overview: Chris Stephenson is the President and COO of Viggle Inc. where he manages the overall business, marketing, product and P&L for the popular loyalty program for television. He joined Viggle Inc. in 2011 with seasoned experience developing internationally-recognized advertising, marketing, and entertainment campaigns. Most recently, Chris lead marketing for Interscope Records, home of multi-platinum recording artists such as Lady Gaga, Eminem, and U2. Previously, Chris led global entertainment marketing at Microsoft. He led marketing and sales for House of Blues and also ran multiple award-winning international advertising campaigns and sponsor-driven programs, including the European Music Awards, for MTV and VH1.
